article:
Dear John,
How are you? Nice to meet  you. From your letter I know a lot about you and your school. Now let me _ something about me and my school.
I am thirteen years old. I am _ Class Two, Grade One. My father is a teacher. He is my _ English teacher. My mother is a doctor. I have a sister.   she and I  are in the same school. We can sing  many songs _ English.
This is my classroom. _ have a class photo on the wall. But can you see _ photo? It's at the door. In the classroom _ our desks and chairs. Mrs. Green is our head teacher. _ is very kind .
Please come and have a look at our school if you are free.
Millie
